Package by.grits.controllers

Class ItemController

java.lang.Object
by.grits.controllers.ItemController
public class ItemController extends Object
This is class controller which provides console input\output. Mostly works with users whose role type is USER. Such users can add new items, remove them or get all the information about it.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem() throws DaoException
      This method is for adding new item. Basically user enters basic item's information and new item is added to imitated database.
      Throws:
      DaoException - due to calling a service method with such exception.

    • showAllItems

      public void showAllItems() throws DaoException
      This method displays items information
      Throws:
      DaoException - due to calling a service method with such exception.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem() throws DaoException
      This method is for removing item. User has to enter item's id, then item will be removed from imitated database.
      Throws:
      DaoException - due to calling a service method with such exception.

    • removeAllItems

      public void removeAllItems() throws DaoException
      This method is for removing all user's items from database
      Throws:
      DaoException - due to calling a service method with such exception.

    • showInfo

      public void showInfo() throws DaoException
      This method displays information of the specific user's item. Requires item's id
      Throws:
      DaoException - due to calling a service method with such exception.

    • itemCommands

      public void itemCommands()
      Basic method for displaying menu of allowed operations for user.
